trans-unit.source: Provides methods for drawing and getting information about a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來繪製及取得相關資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles?displayProperty=fullName> namespace exposes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects that represent all of the controls and user interface (UI) elements that are supported by visual styles.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間會公開<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>物件代表所有控制項和使用者介面 (UI) 項目所支援的視覺化樣式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To draw or get information about a particular element, you must set a VisualStyleRenderer to the element you are interested in.
trans-unit.target: 若要繪製或取得資訊的特定項目，您必須設定 VisualStyleRenderer 您感興趣的項目。

trans-unit.source: A VisualStyleRenderer is automatically set to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.%23ctor%2A> constructor, but you can also set an existing VisualStyleRenderer to a different element by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.SetParameters%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: VisualStyleRenderer 會自動設定為指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，但您也可以設定現有的 VisualStyleRenderer 至不同的項目藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.SetParameters%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.SetParameters%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>

trans-unit.source: To draw an element, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.DrawBackground%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要繪製項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.DrawBackground%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.DrawBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: The VisualStyleRenderer class also includes methods, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>, that provide information about how an element is defined by the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: VisualStyleRenderer 類別也包含方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>，可提供關於項目目前的視覺化樣式所定義的方式資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.%23ctor%2A> constructor and many of the VisualStyleRenderer methods throw exceptions unless visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.%23ctor%2A>建構函式和許多 VisualStyleRenderer 方法擲回例外狀況，除非已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To check for these conditions, use the `static`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查這些條件，請使用`static`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: The VisualStyleRenderer class wraps the functionality of the visual styles (UxTheme) API from the Windows Shell portion of the Windows Platform SDK.
trans-unit.target: VisualStyleRenderer 類別包裝視覺化樣式 (UxTheme) API 來自 Windows Platform SDK Windows Shell 部分的功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles, see "Using Windows XP Visual Styles" in the Platform SDK portion of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/).
trans-unit.target: 多個視覺化樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用 Windows XP 視覺化樣式 」，在 MSDN Library 的 Platform SDK 部分[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref> class using the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref>類別使用給定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ClassName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Part%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.State%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of the `element` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ClassName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Part%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.State%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`element`參數來初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.State%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Part%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ClassName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Before using this constructor, you should call the `static`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A> method to verify whether the current visual style provides a definition for the element specified by the `element` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式之前, 您應該呼叫`static`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A>方法以驗證目前的視覺化樣式是否提供指定的項目定義`element`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref> will represent.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"> </xref>這個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref>將代表。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -或者-作業系統中的使用者已停用視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: -或者-視覺化樣式不會套用至應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: element is not defined by the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: element不是由目前的視覺化樣式定義。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref> class using the given class, part, and state values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref>類別使用指定的類別、 組件和狀態值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `className`, `part`, and `state` parameters to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會使用`className`， `part`，和`state`參數來初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before using this constructor, you should call the `static`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A> method to verify whether the current visual style provides a definition for the element specified by the `className`, `part`, and `state` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式之前, 您應該呼叫`static`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A>方法以驗證目前的視覺化樣式是否提供指定的項目定義`className`， `part`，和`state`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class name of the element that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref> will represent.
trans-unit.target: 項目的類別名稱這個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref>將代表。

trans-unit.source: The part of the element that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref> will represent.
trans-unit.target: 項目的一部分這個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref>將代表。

trans-unit.source: The state of the element that this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref> will represent.
trans-unit.target: 項目的狀態這個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer"></xref>將代表。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -或者-作業系統中的使用者已停用視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: -或者-視覺化樣式不會套用至應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: The combination of className, part, and state is not defined by the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 組合 className ， part ，和 state 不由目前的視覺化樣式定義。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the current visual style element.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的視覺化樣式項目類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property identifies a group of related controls or user interface (UI) elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會識別一組相關的控制項或使用者介面 (UI) 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the class, part, and state of a visual style element, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需類別、 組件和視覺化樣式項目狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the class of the current visual style element.
trans-unit.target: 字串，識別目前的視覺化樣式項目類別。

trans-unit.source: Draws the background image of the current visual style element within the specified bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製目前的視覺化樣式項目中指定的週框矩形的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: This method draws the background of the current visual style element specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製目前的視覺化樣式項目所指定的背景<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A> of the rectangle specified by the `bounds` parameter is less than 0, the DrawBackground method will return without drawing the background.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A>所指定的矩形的`bounds`參數小於 0，DrawBackground 方法返回時不會繪製背景。</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The background of a visual style element can be a bitmap file or a filled border.
trans-unit.target: 背景的視覺化樣式項目可以是點陣圖檔案或填滿的框線。

trans-unit.source: To determine the background type, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷背景型別，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>與引數值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the element background will scale to fit the specified bounds, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否在項目背景會縮放以符合指定的界限，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>與引數值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"></xref> used to draw the background image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"> </xref>用來繪製背景影像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>中繪製背景影像。

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the background image of the current visual style element within the specified bounding rectangle and clipped to the specified clipping rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的視覺化樣式項目，在指定的週框和裁剪的背景影像繪製至指定的裁剪方框。

trans-unit.source: This method draws the background of the current visual style element specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會繪製目前的視覺化樣式項目所指定的背景<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>

trans-unit.source: The background will be clipped to the area specified by the `clipRectangle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 背景會裁剪以所指定的區域`clipRectangle`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A> of the rectangle specified by either the `bounds` or `clipRectangle` parameters is less than 0, the DrawBackground method will return without drawing the background.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A>由指定的矩形`bounds`或`clipRectangle`參數小於 0，DrawBackground 方法返回時不會繪製背景。</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The background of a visual style element can be a bitmap file or a filled border.
trans-unit.target: 背景的視覺化樣式項目可以是點陣圖檔案或填滿的框線。

trans-unit.source: To determine the background type, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷背景型別，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>與引數值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the element background will scale to fit the specified bounds, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A> method with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否在項目背景會縮放以符合指定的界限，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>與引數值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>方法</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"></xref> used to draw the background image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"> </xref>用來繪製背景影像。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>中繪製背景影像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines a clipping rectangle for the drawing operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>定義繪圖作業裁剪方框。

trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws one or more edges of the specified bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 繪製指定的周框的一或多個邊緣。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"></xref> used to draw the edges.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"> </xref>用來繪製邊緣。

trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified image within the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的範圍內的指定的影像繪製。

trans-unit.source: If the visual style applies one of the effects specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect?displayProperty=fullName> values to the current element, this method will apply the effect to the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 如果視覺化樣式套用的其中一個所指定的效果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect?displayProperty=fullName>值在目前的項目，這個方法會將效果套用至繪製影像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用來繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>中繪製影像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>繪製。

trans-unit.target: gor image is .

trans-unit.target: 從指定繪製影像<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>指定的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If the visual style applies one of the effects specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect?displayProperty=fullName> values to the current element, this method will apply the effect to the drawn image.
trans-unit.target: 如果視覺化樣式套用的其中一個所指定的效果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect?displayProperty=fullName>值在目前的項目，這個方法會將效果套用至繪製影像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Returns the content area for the background of the current visual style element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的視覺化樣式項目之背景的內容區域。

trans-unit.source: A visual style can define a content area within each background image.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式可以定義內容區域內每個背景影像。

trans-unit.source: This is the area in which content such as text and icons can be placed without overwriting background borders.
trans-unit.target: 這是中的內容，例如文字區域，而且可以放圖示，而不覆寫背景框線。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the given background area to calculate the content area for the current visual style element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用指定的背景區域來計算目前的視覺化樣式項目的內容區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"></xref> this operation will use.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.IDeviceContext"> </xref>將會使用這項作業。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the entire background area of the current visual style element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，其中包含目前的視覺化樣式項目整個背景區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the operating system is using visual styles to draw controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定作業系統是否正在使用視覺化樣式繪製控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how to individually check for each of the three conditions that must exist for the IsSupported property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何個別檢查每三個條件必須存在 IsSupported 屬性以傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: |Condition|How to determine separately| |---------------|---------------------------------| |The operating system supports visual styles.|Verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsSupportedByOS%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation> class is `true`.| |The user has enabled visual styles in the operating system.|Verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation> class is `true`.| |Visual styles are being used to draw the client area of application windows.|Verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.VisualStyleState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class has the value <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState?displayProperty=fullName>.|
trans-unit.target: |條件 |如何判斷個別 | |---------------|---------------------------------| |作業系統支援視覺化樣式。 |請確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsSupportedByOS%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation>類別屬性是`true`。 | |使用者已啟用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。 |請確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation>類別屬性是`true`。 | |視覺化樣式正被用來繪製的應用程式視窗的工作區。 |確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.VisualStyleState%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>類別具有值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState?displayProperty=fullName>。 |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.VisualStyleState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsSupportedByOS%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operating system supports visual styles, the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system, and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果作業系統支援視覺化樣式，使用者已啟用作業系統中的視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至用戶端區域的應用程式視窗中︰否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property internally.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性在內部。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A> method to verify that the current visual style provides a definition for the element specified by the `className`, `part`, and `state` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法之前, 您應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A>方法以驗證目前的視覺化樣式提供指定的項目定義`className`， `part`，和`state`參數。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class*> property.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part*> property.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part*>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State*> property.
trans-unit.target: 新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.State*>

trans-unit.source: The combination of className, part, and state is not defined by the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 組合 className ， part ，和 state 不由目前的視覺化樣式定義。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -或者-作業系統中的使用者已停用視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: -或者-視覺化樣式不會套用至應用程式視窗的工作區。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current visual style element.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的視覺化樣式項目狀態。

trans-unit.source: This property identifies the current visual state of the element identified by the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會識別目前所識別的元素的目前可見狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Part%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.Class%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the class, part, and state of a visual style element, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需類別、 組件和視覺化樣式項目狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>

trans-unit.source: A value that identifies the state of the current visual style element.
trans-unit.target: 可識別目前的視覺化樣式項目狀態的值。
